archimate:Requirement.name: build with EDR (endpoint detection and response) /XDR (extended detection and response) detection and response capabilities with SOAR (Security orchestration, automation and response)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As security operator I require that security monitoring is build with EDR (endpoint detection and response) /XDR (extended detection and response) detection and response capabilities with SOAR (Security orchestration, automation and response). Log-collection and processing based monitoring is not anymore even today modern solution and EDR/XDR will ensure a proactive approach and rapid response to cyberattacks and unauthorized access
